channel.title: Node.js on htr3n's
channel.description: Recent content in Node.js on htr3n's

item.title: Building Node Canvas Container for AWS Lambda
item.description: The Cairo-backed node-canvas has been a pillar for many Node.js based projects that need to simulate a browser canvas on the server-side. One of our recent projects uses Apache ECharts to render some graphs.

item.title: Node.js package managers: NPM and Yarn
item.description: Node.js is an increasingly popular and widely used JavaScript runtime nowadays. One of the important aspects of Node.js is to manage the dependencies among software artefacts. Better dependency management would advocate modularisation and decoupling of software components.
